sentences.simplifiedText: 你得以来参加这个活动
sentences.traditionalText: 你得以來參加這個活動
sentences.pinyin: Nǐ déyǐ lái cānjiā zhège huódòng
sentences.translation: You are able to attend this event

sentences.simplifiedText: 尽管有许多困难，我们还是得以完成任务
sentences.traditionalText: 盡管有許多困難，我們還是得以完成任務
sentences.pinyin: Jǐnguǎn yǒu xǔduō kùnnán, wǒmen háishì déyǐ wánchéng rènwù
sentences.translation: Despite many difficulties, we were still able to complete the mission

sentences.simplifiedText: 你的鼓励让我得以继续。
sentences.traditionalText: 你的鼓勵讓我得以繼續。
sentences.pinyin: nǐ de gǔlì ràng wǒ déyǐ jìxù.
sentences.translation: Your encouragement enables me to continue.

sentences.simplifiedText: 只有得到你的许可，我才得以进入这个房间。
sentences.traditionalText: 只有得到你的許可，我才得以進入這個房間。
sentences.pinyin: zhǐyǒu dédào nǐ de xǔkě, wǒ cái déyǐ jìnrù zhège fángjiān.
sentences.translation: Only with your permission am I able to enter this room.

sentences.pinyin: Wǒ déyǐ qù jiàn wǒ de péngyǒu.
sentences.translation: I am finally in a position to see my friends.

sentences.simplifiedText: 经过了这么多的困难和挑战，我终于得以见到了你。
sentences.traditionalText: 經過了這麼多的困難和挑戰，我終於得以見到了妳。
sentences.pinyin: Jīngguòle zhème duō de kùnnán hé tiǎozhàn, wǒ zhōngyú déyǐ jiàn dàole nǐ.
sentences.translation: After countless difficulties and challenges, I finally get to see you.
